item.title: Building my new blog: Part 2
item.description: In the last post I wrote about my considerations about what software to use for my blog, where to host it and how to set it up. This post contains some more techinical details like the git structure and the deployment process. So then let’s dive in. The git structure Link to heading The hugo projects mentions in their documentation to use a git submodule for the theme. Git explains that you can use this feature to integrate another project into your repository while still getting the latest commits from the other repo.
